message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1350000. This is the best price I can offer at this point.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1325000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise again and offer the product to you for $1320000. This is the best price I can offer at this point.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1315000.
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $1312000. This is the best price I can offer at this point.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering our discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1310000.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $1308000. This is my final offer.
After careful consideration, I would like to make a final counteroffer of $1305000 for the product.
